title: [Placements] Applying for tier 1 after securing tier 2 job (fte+internship).
content: A friend of mine got placed in tier 2 company offering both FTE + Internship. But he is continuing to apply for other tier 1 companies for (FTE+internship) is he going to be blacklisted or something? Pls help

comments.body: U can have only 1 intern offer so he can apply only for fte roles
But he's already been writing FTE+internship offers. Will the placement office contact him for doing so?
Eventually they will find out once his name starts showing up in shortlists or final selection lists, because that is usually when they tally against your quota.

>"friend"

Are you suspecting the person just being OP
Of course, people asking for a *friend* are usually always asking for *themselves*.
You won't be blacklisted but you'll be taken off shortlists if you apply for T1 Intern+FTE roles. T1 FTEs are fine but smaller in number.
I think T1 FTEs for came towards the second half of the placement cycle, quite a handful of them only appeared like VISA being one i can think on top of my head rn
Yes same, I can only recollect Aveva
